data.text: @maslowsneeds And then there are all the unreported deaths and debilitating strokes from the clot shot. I've known too many people personally who either dropped dead or are now in nursing home rehabs. It's reprehensible.

@maslowsneeds I guess to me that looks like self-aware trade-offs made by people who understand the situation all too well from life experiences, whereas those who are more privileged aren’t used to getting fucked over, so they often don’t recognize it when it’s happening.

@NoMassInfection Our life experiences are different, given our different identities. In  New York, many of the most vulnerable communities are POC. And they've been very obedient, first to Andrew Cuomo and now to Kathy Hochul.
@maslowsneeds I’m a white person and when I look around, all of the most gullible morons are other white people. At least it’s not incompatible with my tendency to be self-loathing. 👍😃

@NoMassInfection Within a large group of POC, the first White person with an aristocratic or élite background that pays any attention to them, can sway them into agreeing to almost anything. One White person admitted to me that this is what he does.

@maslowsneeds I’m not in NY but the same thing is happening all over the U.S. and other wealthy Western countries (as I’m sure you know).
Yeah, I actually referred to it a few months ago as “grooming.” People are being groomed and it’s insanely easy, apparently.

@NoMassInfection The population is being « preened » by Covid-19. The Government let vulnerable people go first (nursing home residents, ppl with comorbidities). The next group won’t know what hit them. Quite literally, they won’t know. Cuomo was okay with this, now Hochul is, too.
@maslowsneeds It’s mind blowing. The cognitive dissonance is like nails on a chalkboard. If you point this out to people, they act like you’re the fucking QAnon Shaman. 🤣🤣😭😭😭😭
